newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Tunis bourse index closes down in higher volume.
newsitem.headline: Tunis bourse index closes down in higher volume.

text.p: The Tunis Stock Exchange on Thursday closed down 2.93 points in higher trade, bourse sources said.
The market's 30-share index closed at 605.16 from 608.09 on Wednesday.
Trade volume was 1.8 million dinars against 1.4 million dinars.
BIAT bank was down 1.84 dinars to 59.54 dinars. Retail stores Monoprix eased 1.46 dinars to 47.36 dinars. Investment fund SPDIT-SICAF lost 1.22 dinars to 39.36 dinars.
